data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_dea170bfd5f26c41fb04e5edf72afedb.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
Fredrinn gains 1 <font color="a6aafb">Combo Point</font> that lasts 5s each time his skill hits a non-minion enemy, up to 4 <font color="a6aafb">Combo Points</font>. His Ultimates cost different numbers of <font color="a6aafb">Combo Points</font>.

Fredrinn stores 100% of the damage he receives as <font color="a6aafb">Crystal Energy</font>, which decays after 5s at a rate of 10% Max HP per second.
Fredrinn can convert the stored <font color="a6aafb">Crystal Energy</font> into HP by 20% of his damage dealt (10% for damage dealt to minions). Gaining a <font color="a6aafb">Combo Point</font> resets the decaying timer.

Fredrinn thrusts his sword in the target direction, dealing 125<font color="26e407"> (+7% Total HP)</font> <font color="fba51f">(+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies hit and slowing them by 30% for 2s. His next Basic Attack gains extra attack range and deals 85<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.
This skill deals 150% damage to non-hero enemies.

Fredrinn dashes in the target direction, dealing 140<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to the first non-minion enemy hit. His next Basic Attack knocks the target airborne for 0.3s.

Fredrinn deals 210<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to nearby enemies and taunts them for 1s. Hitting a non-minion enemy grants Fredrinn 25 Physical & Magic Defense for 3s and reduces the cooldowns of <font color="a6aafb">Piercing Strike</font> and <font color="a6aafb">Brave Assault</font> by 75%.
This skill costs 1 <font color="a6aafb">Combo Point</font>.

Fredrinn slams his sword in the target direction, dealing 600 plus 21% of his <font color="a6aafb">Crystal Energy</font> as <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area after a short delay. Enemies in the center of the area take 175% damage. This skill doubles the conversion ratio based on damage dealt to enemy heroes from stored <font color="a6aafb">Crystal Energy</font> to HP.
This skill costs 3 <font color="a6aafb">Combo Points</font>.

data.name: Fredrinn

__data.skilldesc:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num1> [C5True Damage] to the target Creep or Minion.####[C2Passive]: Increases Creep rewards by <%Num2> and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by <%Num3>. Also grants <%Num5> additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first <Num4> min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first <Num6> min.####[C2Blessing:] Accumulate <Num8> Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.
__data.skilldescemblem:
Deal 520 (+80*Hero Level) <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to the target Creep or Minion.
<font color="62f8fe">Passive</font>: Increases Creep rewards by 60% and reduces damage taken from basic Creeps by 40%. Also grants 15% additional Damage Reduction in the allied jungle during the first 2 min. Cannot share Minion rewards with allied heroes in the first 5 min.
<font color="62f8fe">Blessing:</font> Accumulate 5 Creep kills, hero kills, or assists to upgrade the spell according to the Jungling Boots' Blessing, and <Num9> kills or assists to gain <Num10> Physical Attack and Magic Power and <Num11> Max HP.

recommendmasterplan.description: Jungle: Super tanky & good teamfight tank.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+500 Extra Max HP
+10 Extra Physical Defense
+10 Extra Magic Defense
+4 HP Regen

emblemskill.skilldesc: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by <%Num1>. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Damage against Lord and Turtle is increased by 15%. This bonus is halved against regular Creeps and doesn't affect the damage of Retribution.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers <%Num1> of Max HP.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num2>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
equiplist.equipskill2: Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fortitude: CC and Slow Duration reduced by 30%
Hunter: After dealing damage to a Creep, deal 25(+3*Hero Level) + (+0.01 Total HP) True Damage to the target over 3s (damage is increased by 100% for non-Marksmen heroes).
equiplist.equiptips:
+40 Movement Speed
+18 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Burning Soul: Deals <font color="26e407"> (+0.012 Total HP)</font> Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second. This damage is increased by 125(+15*Hero Level)% against creeps and minions.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Burning Soul: Deals <font color="26e407"> (+0.012 Total HP)</font> Magic Damage to nearby enemies per second. This damage is increased by 125(+15*Hero Level)% against creeps and minions.
equiplist.equiptips:
+1200 Extra Max HP
+20 Extra Magic Defense

equiplist.equipskill1: Recovery: Recovers <font color="26e407"> (+0.025 Total HP)</font> HP per second (reduced to <font color="26e407"> (+0.005 Total HP)</font> HP per second over 5s after taking damage).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Recovery: Recovers <font color="26e407"> (+0.025 Total HP)</font> HP per second (reduced to <font color="26e407"> (+0.005 Total HP)</font> HP per second over 5s after taking damage).
equiplist.equiptips:
+1550 Extra Max HP
+20 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Shield: Upon taking Magic Damage, reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the damage that triggers the effect). Regains this effect 5s after leaving combat.
equiplist.equiptips:
+900 Extra Max HP
+48 Extra Magic Defense
+2 HP Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: Dikson
recommendmasterplan.title: Influencer

data.story: A master treasure appraiser in Los Pecados accumulating wealth and searching for his lost friend.

assist.desc: Fredrinn works best with support heroes, who can further improve his survivability, like Angela and Floryn.

strong.desc: Fredrinn is strong against Mage heroes who rely on skill bursts, as it is difficult for them to one-shot him with their bursts. Instead, once Fredrinn has enough Combo Points, he can use his 2nd Ultimate to easily finish them off. Such as Vale and Eudora.

weak.desc: Fredrinn is countered by Marksman heroes who can deal True Damage, as they can take him down very easily. Heroes like Kerrie and Lesley are good examples here.
